name: Luna (itch) (Mr. Ewing)
description:
Luna - Created Nov. 2012

You are a marooned space pilot and must defend your ship from the attacking aliens long enough to power your ship and escape the planet with you life. There are 3 screens you can venture to. The first one contains your ship where you can spend coins to upgrade your systems. Use the 'E' key to interact with anything possible. The next screen to the left contains your outpost, where you can spend your coins to buy more ammo. The next screen to the left is from where the aliens cometh! Defend and survive! In  Luna!

All art, music, and sounds effects made by me.
